missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Place 1 red Imperial mission token on the red highlighted space.
{-} The red Imperial mission token represents Zaaryn. Zaaryn is a neutral figure.
{-} Zaaryn moves up to 5 spaces at the start of each Status Phase. Then, if he is not in line of sight of any hero, {D} is increased.
{-} The blue Imperial mission token represents the informant. The informant is a neutral figure. When Zaaryn is adjacent to the informant, he makes contact.
{-} Heroes with line of sight to the informant can interact with the informant to try and identify him. They do not need to be adjacent to him, they only require line of sight.
{-} The mission will progress when the informant is identified.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
missionProperties.startingObjective: Identify the informant before Zaaryn makes contact.
missionProperties.repositionOverride: Block line of sight to the informant.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You locate Zaaryn in the dingy streets of the Coruscant underworld. He is dressed in plain clothes, making it difficult to distinguish him among the throng of commoners.

As you tail him, you get the feeling that Zaaryn is not the only one being pursued. You catch figures in the crowd watching you a bit too intently. Subtlety is eventually abandoned as a pair of Imperial riot troopers step out to block your path.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.tbText:
Zaaryn moves out to rendezvous with the informant.

{-} Place 1 red Imperial mission token on the red highlighted space.
{-} The red Imperial mission token represents Zaaryn. Zaaryn is a neutral figure.
{-} Zaaryn moves up to 5 spaces at the start of each Status Phase. Then, if he is not in line of sight of any hero, {D} is increased.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Zaaryn's informant lurks somewhere in this corner. You need to identify him before it is too late.

{-} When Zaaryn is adjacent to the informant, select "Make Contact".
{-} Heroes with line of sight to the informant can interact with the informant to try and identify him. They do not need to be adjacent to him to do so.

eventActions.tbText:
Zaaryn's contact lurks somewhere in the crowded streets.

{-} The blue Imperial mission token represents the informant. The informant is a neutral figure. When Zaaryn is adjacent to the informant, he makes contact.
{-} Heroes with line of sight to the informant can interact with the informant to try and identify him. They do not need to be adjacent to him, they only require line of sight.
{-} The mission will progress when the informant is identified.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: “Wait, wait!” pants out the Clawdite as you advance. “I'm not Zaaryn; I'm just his double!” he shouts desperately. “He couldn't let his superiors know what he was up to, so he hired me. I was just supposed to make contact and report back. The real meeting between Zaaryn and Maul will happen off-world in a few days. That’s all I know!” You share this information with your leaders, who are intrigued and tempted to chase the lead. But they also inform you of a local group of Alliance sympathizers who have reached out and now wish to rendezvous to trade information. They leave it to you to prioritize the operations. {-} The Rebels win the mission! {-} Heroes receive the “Intercepted Plans” Reward card. (This Reward card works differently when playing with Imperial Commander. Refer to the Rules Change section of the wiki documentation for details.) {-} Each hero receives 2 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero. {-} The heroes must choose to track Zaaryn or meet with the sympathizers. If the heroes track Zaaryn, place Story Mission card “Disruption” into play, If they meet the sympathizers, place Story Mission card “Into a Corner” into play.

A flurry of blaster bolts drives you away with only a glimpse of your targets and  their business dealings. You are left with more questions than answers.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) increases by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
{-} Each hero receives 2 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

Zaaryn performs the following instructions:

{A}: Move 3 spaces towards the informant, breaking line of sight to all heroes if possible. Then, if outside line of sight of any hero, end this activation.
{A}: Move 2 spaces towards the informant, breaking line of sight if possible.
{-} If he is adjacent to the informant, click the informant and select "Make Contact".

eventActions.mainText:
You look around for your quarry.

Is Zaaryn within line of sight of any hero?

events.eventText:
Zaaryn performs the following instructions:

{-} This figure takes the upper, direct route to the informant.
{A}: Move 3 spaces towards the informant, breaking line of sight to all heroes if possible. Then, if outside line of sight of any hero, end this activation.
{A}: Move 2 spaces towards the informant, breaking line of sight if possible.
{-} If he is adjacent to the informant, click the informant and select "Make Contact".

eventActions.mainText:
You look around for your quarry.

Is Zaaryn within line of sight of any hero?

events.eventText:
Zaaryn performs the following instructions:

{-} This figure takes the lower route to the informant, moving through the doors.
{-} Doors to not block this figures movement.
{A}: Move 3 spaces towards the informant, breaking line of sight to all heroes if possible. Then, if outside line of sight of any hero, end this activation.
{A}: Move 2 spaces towards the informant, breaking line of sight if possible.
{-} If he is adjacent to the informant, click the informant and select "Make Contact".

eventActions.mainText:
You look around for your quarry.

Is Zaaryn within line of sight of any hero?

events.eventText: You sigh a breath of relief as you catch sight of Zaaryn.

Zaaryn is gone. You have lost him in the crowd. It takes you precious minutes before you spot him again, and when you do, your hearts are beating wildly, and you can feel the pressure of the pursuit bearing down on you.

Zaaryn disappears into the crowd. You can still catch occasional glimpses of him, but you can't make out the person he is talking to. You'll have to move fast if you want to see who his contact ist.

{-} The Rebels have two rounds to identify the contact.
{-} After the two rounds are over, the contact escapes, ending the mission.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Zaaryn's informant lurks somewhere in this corner. You need to identify him before it is too late.

{-} When Zaaryn is adjacent to the informant, select "Make Contact".
{-} Heroes with line of sight to the informant can interact with the informant to try and identify him. They do not need to be adjacent to him to do so.

eventActions.shortText: Identify the informant before Zaaryn finishes the deal. Rounds left: 2

eventActions.theText:
{-} Heroes with line of sight to the informant can interact with the informant to try and identify him. They do not need to be adjacent to him, they only require line of sight.
{-} The mission will progress when the informant is identified.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
Through the darkness and gloom, you see the outline of the shadowy figure with whom Zaaryn is meeting to trade on his knowledge of the sphere shard. In the hand of Zaaryn’s contact, you see a portable holographic projector showing the blue, replicated image of a severe Dathomiri male, clad in a black cloak and carrying a lightsaber hilt at his side: the former Sith turned rogue, Maul.

The informant notices you and slinks away from the fight, back into the shadows of Coruscant’ dingy alleyways. His business concluded, Zaaryn turns to you, barking orders to his guards.

{-} Remove the token representing Zaaryn from the map and replace it with an <color="red">Imperial Officer</color>.
{-} Zaaryn (the <color="red">Imperial Officer</color>) now activates as normal and no longer increases {D} if he is not in line of sight of a hero.
{-} The mission will progress when Zaaryn is defeated.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Zaaryn's informant lurks somewhere in this corner. You need to identify him before it is too late.

{-} When Zaaryn is adjacent to the informant, select "Make Contact".
{-} Heroes with line of sight to the informant can interact with the informant to try and identify him. They do not need to be adjacent to him to do so.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The mission will progress when Zaaryn is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.mainText:
Coordinating with your companions, you try to make out any details in the crowd. 

{-} Test {I}. You may reroll 1 die for each other hero with line of sight to the informant. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: There are simply too many people. Anyone could be the informant. You need to keep trying.

events.eventText: You still haven't found out who Zaaryn's informant is. You need to hurry.

eventActions.shortText: Identify the informant before Zaaryn finishes the deal. Rounds left: 1

events.eventText: Both Zaaryn and his unidentified contact slip away into the crowds. You lose them before you can even think about who to follow.

eventActions.shortText: Identify the informant before Zaaryn finishes the deal. Rounds left: 0

events.eventText:
The Empire increases its efforts to discover the background of the current situation. A traitorous historian appears to hold much information.

{-} Place Story Mission card "Double Agent" into play.

The Rebels have foiled the Imperial plans long enough. The Empire increases its efforts to stop them.

{-} Place Story Mission card "Into a Corner" into play.
You catch a shadowy glimpse of one of your pursuers. Wait... didn't she look completely different just a second ago?

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The door leads into a small cantina.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

The door leads into a small cantina.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

events.eventText: Both doors to the cantina open simultaneously. You see a middle-aged man standing behind the counter. Suddenly, his face ripples and shifts, and he pulls out a blaster.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The door leads into a small cantina.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

The door leads into a small cantina.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

eventActions.tbText:
The fake bartender ducks behind the counter and fires shots in your direction.

{-} The just deployed Clawdite Shapeshifter interrupts to attack {rebel}.

events.eventText:
With a shriek, Zaaryn staggers backward and his skin begins to strangely wrinkle and discolor. Before your eyes, the once-human figure reveals its true Clawdite form.

{-} Replace Zaaryn with a <color="red">Clawdite Shapeshifter</color>.
{-} Apply +3 Health to the <color="red">Clawdite Shapeshifter</color>.
{-} The Rebels win when the <color="red">Clawdite Shapeshifter</color> is defeated.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The Rebels win when Zaaryn's true form is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.mainText:
You look around for your quarry.

Is Zaaryn within line of sight of any hero?

events.eventText: Because Zaaryn was defeated, the heroes receive 25 credits per hero.
The threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) increases by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
